titleStmt.title: Certaine godlie and learned sermons Made vpon these sixe following parables of our Sauiour Christ, declared in the Gospell. 1. Of the vncleane spirit. 2. Of the prodigall sonne. 3. Of the rich man and Lazarus. 4. Of the vvounded man. 5. Of the vnmercifull seruant. 6. Of the faithfull seruant. By S.I.
titleStmt.author: I. S.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. R[oberts] for R. B[ankworth] and are to be solde in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Sunne,

notesStmt.note: Printer's and publisher's names from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Sunne
